text:
We had the pleasure of attending the Open House event at Playfacto Student Care Jurong, and we are absolutely thrilled with what we experienced. As parents, we hold high standards for the care and enrichment our child receives, and after our visit, we are confidently convinced that Playfacto Student Care is the perfect fit.

The warmth and enthusiasm of the staff at Playfacto Student Care Jurong were truly exceptional. Their genuine passion for providing a safe, nurturing, and enriching environment for children was evident in every interaction. The team's dedication to fostering a sense of belonging and engagement was heartwarming.

The facilities at Playfacto Student Care Jurong are nothing short of impressive. The organized and well-equipped spaces for learning, recreation, and relaxation are a testament to the center's commitment to holistic development. It's clear that careful thought has been put into creating an environment where children can thrive, learn, and have fun.

My girl went to playfacto jurong for the past 3 years. Activities are well prepared. The centre is clean. Teachers always share feedback on children and their development. The food is good. School holidays are the best as they plan a lot of interesting activities for the children. My girl is sad, leaving playfacto as she is in the upper primary and no longer needs to be in student care. Playfacto is a student care centre that I would recommend all parents ðŸ˜€

We appreciate Mr Raymond and his team, especially Teacher Estherâ€™s and Teacher Fancyâ€™s dedication and patience to my boy who has special needs. Teacher Esther is encouraging and nurturing to the kids and Mr Raymond shows open mindedness on our feedbacks and requests.

The center is always clean, and the teachers are friendly and supportive, providing valuable guidance and homework assistance to my daughter. She has truly enjoyed her two years here, and weâ€™re so glad we chose this student care center. It has alleviated a lot of stress for us as working parents, knowing she is well cared for. Additionally, the variety of activities offered keeps her engaged and happy. Overall, we couldnâ€™t be happier with our decision!

Playfacto is the first & only student care for my boy of his P2 & P3. Teachers are kind, helpful and caring enough to him during his tough time of start schooling in Singapore from other country. Study and activities are balanced too. I would recommend if parents are finding a decent student care in Jurong West area.
